name: Movado Kingmatic SS 25 Jewel Automatic Chronograph
description:
New RARE Vintage Movado Kingmatic SS 25 Jewel Automatic 
Chronograph in the box!!
Condition: New/Old Stock 

The Movado Kingmatic is a very special luxury watch that has been highly sought after since it was discontinued some 20 years ago.

We have the largest inventory of Factory Movado Kingmantic Watches in the world!!

It’s a beautiful watch with a Movado rare automatic 25 jewel movement with a locking Black Leather band. This Chronograph timepiece is a must for any and all watch lovers!
It has a very simple yet elegant design, as they say, "they don't make them as they use to!"

The handsome black dial with large numbers and red hands is a stylish combination that would make any high-end watch jealous!

BUY ONE NOW BEFORE THERE GONE FOREVER!!
Please remember these are NEW in the box, NEVER BEEN WORN!!
Movado discontinued this model back in 1991, so buy a piece of watch history today!!

Please email us any questions or concerns

Specs:
•Gender: Men's 
•Condition: New
•Model: Kingmatic Chronograph, 1881 Series #0604366
•Movement: Valjoux 7750, a 25 Jewel Swiss Automatic movement
•Polished Stainless Steel Case
•Sapphire Crystal
•Black Dial
•Luminescent hands and Arabic number hour markers
•Silver Sub-Dials
•Day/Date Function located at the 3 o’clock position
•Water resistant up to approximately 100m (Approximately 328 feet)
•Black waterproof leather strap
•Case width (without crown): Approximately 38mm (Approximately 1.50 inches)
•Case width (with crown):  Approximately 41.28mm (Approximately 1.63 inches)  
•Lug to Lug:  Approximately 41.28 mm (Approximately 1.63 inches)  
•Case thickness:  Approximately 14 mm (Approximately 0.55 inches)
•Watch Length:  Approximately 9.5 inches
 
Suggested Retail: $2995.00
 
WM016

name: MOVADO ELLIPTICA 0604811 AUTOMATIC WATCH
description: MOVADO ELLIPTICA 0604811 AUTOMATIC WATCH Condition: New NEW beautiful Luxury RARE Movado Elliptica Watch! This stylish timepiece is manual winding 25 Jewels Movement Made in Switzerland The Movado Elliptica is immediately recognizable by the unique position of the numbers on the dial. Each numeral, aside from the quarter hour markers (which remain in their traditional positions), is arrayed at the top and bottom of the watch face, trailing horizontal lines that meet with the Elliptica's hands to easily indicate the time. The Movado Elliptica's stainless steel case is curved to fit the wrist, and is shaped like a comma when viewed from the side. Chronograph models are also available and are equally distinctive-the chronograph buttons are uniquely positioned at ten, twelve and two o'clock, instead of on the right side of the watch, where they are commonly found. The Movado Elliptica is available with highly-polished stainless steel bracelets or elegant alligator straps, and is protected with scratch-resistant sapphire crystal. This unique Movado creation sports either precision Swiss-quartz movement, or Swiss automatic movement that winds from the natural pendulum motion of your arm. FEATURES: -Shape: Rectangular -Finish: Polished and Brushed -Material: Stainless Steel -Width: 25 mm without crown -Thickness: 11 mm -Case Length with Lugs: 38 mm -Hands: Silver Tone Hands -Markers: Arabic Numerals BEZEL -Material: Stainless Steel MOVEMENT -Type: Mechanical Automatic (Self-Winding) -Country Of Origin: Made in Switzerland BAND -Type: Strap -Material: Alligator Leather -Color: Black -Width: 18 mm -Length: 8.5 inches -Clasp: Pin Buckle Note: The box shows some signs of handling Please email us any questions or concerns! name: Concord Impresario Women White Dial Watch 0308742
description: Concord Impresario Women White Dial Watch 0308742 Condition: New in the box Handcrafted by Swiss watchmakers, this Concord Impresario women's watch combines classic design and the finest materials into an elegant timepiece. This stainless steel watch with coin edge features a textured white dial with Roman numerals at 6, 9, and 12; a date display rests at 3. The water-resistant case and sapphire crystal protects the quartz movement. A deployment buckle secures the bracelet. In 1915, Concord produced the first private-label luxury watches featuring diamonds and precious metals. Once the official gift of U.S. Presidents to visiting heads of state, Concord watches continue the tradition of handcrafting quality and elegance into each timepiece. description: CONCORD IMPRESARIO CHRONOGRAPH WATCH 14.G9.210 Condition: New This is an incredible and rare beautiful Concord Impresario Watch Swiss Made, has a striking brushed Stainless Steel Dial with polished Stainless Steel hour markers, numbers and hands. The three register Chronograph features are located at the 3, 6 and 9 o’clock positions and have Stainless Steel sweep hands. This incredible watch features the El Primero Zenith Calibre 411 Movement that beats at 36,000 vibrations per hour that enables 1/10th of a second precision. This watch also features the day of the week, the month and the calendar date. The band for this watch is and interlocking Stainless Steel Band with a fully adjustable Deployment Clasp safety lock for security. This beautiful and classical timepiece is also Water Resistant to 100 feet/ 30 meters and has a Flawless Sapphire Crystal. name: CONCORD VENTU CHRONOGRAPH AUTOMATIC WATCH 14 A7 1891
description: CONCORD VENTU CHRONOGRAPH AUTOMATIC WATCH 14 A7 1891 Condition: New This Men's Concord Ventu, model 14.A7.1891 is a beautiful Luxury watch brand new!! Guaranteed 100% Authentic. The retail price for this watch is $5500. It features a case, crown, two buttons, and lugs made from stainless steel. A pushed down back plate helps to protect an automatic movement The case measures 40mm without the crown (43mm with the crown). Meanwhile, the bracelet uses stainless steel links. It can fit a wrist up to 7.25 inches and is attached to a stainless steel butterfly clasp. The silver toned dial features a tachymeter curved from the bezel. The hour markers are indicated by silver toned numerals while the minute/second markers are indicated by smaller black lines. Silver toned hour, minute, and second hands circle the markers. Three Chronograph sub-dials are located in place of the 6, 9, and 12 o'clock marker. They represent a 12 hour counter, 30 minute counter, and subsidiary seconds respectively. A date window featured in place of the 3 o'clock marker. Note: The box shows some signs of handling but the watch itself is immaculate Specs: -Stainless Steel Case -Stainless Steel bracelet with double deployment locking butterfly clasp. -Rare High Grade ETA 2892-2 37 Jewel Automatic Movement specifically designed for the Concord Ventu Watch -Sapphire Crystal Face, Grey and Black Dial with Tachymeter, Stainless Steel hands and hour markers. -Numeric Date Function located at 3 o’clock -Grey sub-dials: 12 hour recorder sub-dial at 6 o’clock, 30 minute recorder sub-dial at 9 o’clock, and the seconds sub-dial at 12 o’clock. -Water Resistant to 30m (Approximately 98.43 feet) -Width without crown: Approximately 41.3 mm (Approximately 1.63 inches) -Case length lug to lug: Approximately 46 mm (Approximately 1.81 inches) -Case thickness: Approximately 7.9 mm (Approximately 0.31 inches) -Length/diameter of band with closed clasp Approximately 209.6 mm (Approximately 8.25 inches) -Band thickness: Approximately 3.18 mm (Approximately 0.13 inches) -Timepiece Weight: Approximately 172.93 grams (Approximately 6.1 ounces) Please email us any questions or concerns! name: Tissot PRS516 NASCAR Chronograph LIMITED EDITION Watch
description: Tissot PRS516 NASCAR Chronograph LIMITED EDITION Watch Condition: New in the box Up for grabs is a NEW RARE Tissot PRS516 NASCAR LIMITED EDITION Luxury Watch! These are individually numbered and Tissot only made 500 We have the following numbers available: #121/500 #074/500 #104/500 #039/500 #189/500 #092/500 #105/500 #042/500 #187/500 #256/500 If you buy this watch one of those numbered watches will be mailed. If you have a preference please let us know as soon as you buy the watch. If your a rare watch collector or looking for a unique and rare timepiece..this is it!! The Nascar PRS56 has a Swiss 7750 Valjoux 25 jewel automatic mechanical movement with a stylish leather butterfly lock adjustable strap We found some info on this watch you should read: "Budweiser To Award Tissot Limited-Edition Watch to NASCAR Nextel Cup Bud Pole Winners Winning the Budweiser Pole Award at a NASCAR Nextel Cup event is based upon a very simple theory: complete a lap in less time than any other driver. To emphasize the essence of time, Anheuser-Busch will award a Tissot PRS 516 Valjoux NASCAR limited-edition watch to each driver who wins a Bud Pole Award in 2006. This unique timepiece is limited to 500 pieces worldwide. Statement from Mark Rossi, Vice President of Sales and Marketing, Dover Motorsports, Inc.: "We are excited to welcome Tissot as the official watch of Dover International Speedway. Together we will introduce the NASCAR community, and fans of the Monster Mile, to Tissot's first-rate products." PRS 516 Valjoux NASCAR Limited Edition The PRS 516 Valjoux NASCAR Limited Edition features dynamic materials, including the NASCAR logo engraved on steering wheel cut-out with see-through case back. This timepiece also features a carbon dial and sophisticated Valjoux chronograph, bringing the precision of a Swiss made automatic movement to select fans. Inspired by the passion and precision in motor sports, this timepiece is limited to 500 pieces worldwide, paying homage to NASCAR's ultimate race in Daytona, Florida. This watch is new and unworn and comes in its original display gift box. This timepiece comes with the User’s Manual, the Tissot Two year warranty card (unsigned), and literature on the Tissot Collections, as well as “The Story of a Watch Company”, which is a book about the history of Tissot, marking the 150th anniversary of the company in 2003." Note: The box shows some signs of handling but the watch itself is immaculate Features: -Gender: Men’s -Model #: T91.1.427.82 -Limited Edition #: 357/500 -Brushed Stainless Steel Case -Black PVD tachometer bezel -Movement: 25 jeweled Swiss 7750 Valjoux Mechanical -Automatic Movement -Sapphire Crystal Face -Black Carbon-Fiber Dial with Luminescent Index Hour Indicators and Hands -Chronograph Hand -Day and Date functions -Sub-dials: Seconds sub-dial at 9 o’clock, Recorder 30 minutes sub-dial at 12 o’clock and Recorder 12 hour sub-dial at 6 o’clock -Screw down crown -Skeleton Back with Sapphire Crystal for Automatic Movement Observation -Black Leather Band with Adjustable Stainless Steel Butterfly Clasp baring the Tissot logo -Water resistant up to Approximately 100 meters (Approximately 330ft) Size Measurements: -Width without Crown: Approximately 44.45 mm (Approximately 1.75 inches) -Case Length Lug to Lug: Approximately 50.8 mm (Approximately 2 inches) -Case Thickness: Approximately 11.11 mm (Approximately 0.44 inches) -Strap length tip to tip: Approximately 228.6 mm (Approximately 9 inches) -Strap Width: Approximately 19.05 mm (Approximately 0.75 inches) This watch is heavy with a total approximate weight of 4.1 oz.
